comments:
Happens on both 1.3 and 3.0.

WSWB 3.0
20040204_1437

WSWB-SDK-2.1.2.1
20040204_1306

- Start the workbench with a fresh workspace.
- Close all perspectives.
- Open the profiling & logging perspective.
- Close the perspective.
- Open it again.

Check the log file, you should have a few NullPointerExceptions. In 3.0 you 
also get an error message printed to stdout.

Here is the exception:

Fixed in 1.3 and HEAD.

The init() from the action delegates in the Profiling monitor view was trying 
to get the page that contains the view in order to add listeners to it. It was 
getting the page by trying to get the currently displayed page (which appears 
not to have been set at this point; i.e. null). The fix is to query the view 
directly to see what page it is contained in.
